As Chief Executive Officer, I assist in managing fiscal functions and ensuring operational efficiency. I conduct detailed need assessment and implements action plans ensuring customer engagement and identification of new revenue opportunities.I am responsible for developing weekly reports, establishing marketing plans to increase market share and rendering assistance to organize international fairs within the industry.Also, I establish strategic recruitment programs to attract top-quality applicants manage leader values team work and encourage staff advancementAccomplishments of this role include:•	Initiated the corporation from scratch with all legalities and obtained approvals from different authorities and law enforcement in CA & the US•	Aligned training programs to meet corporate objectives•	Maintained professional relationships with industry personnel & clients, as well as government agencies and community organizations to expand market reach and increase brand awareness

As Owner / Managing Director, I established the company from scratch and obtained approval from The Minister of Tourism in Egypt. I was deeply involved in facilitating travel of Government Dignitaries and Official Delegations including Foreign Military Leaders & Diplomats visiting Egypt and The Middle East. I monitored all facets of project lifecycle of diplomatic and high-security clients.Additionally, I was responsible for:•	Arranging meetings, official delegations, incentives, conferences and public events; elected logistics & operationsAccomplishments of this role include:•	Played a key role in developing programs for promoting Egypt as a business and leisure destination•	Started with 3 employees and leading to the establishment of high-performing team of 162 members with YOY increase between 10% and 12% and revenue of $35 - $40MKey events handled:•	Cape to Cairo & Cairo to Cape Expeditions, South Africa, Jul / Aug 2011•	United Nations – Population Council Board of Trustees’ Event, Jan 2008•	Global South Episcopal Church Worldwide Event, Oct 2005•	International Republican Institute (I.R.I.) Inspection Committee, USA, Sep 2005•	Mrs. Madeleine Albright's visit to Egypt, Jan 2005•	Mr. Karamenlis, Greece's Prime Minister first visit to Egypt, Nov 2004•	Greek Foreign Ministry Delegation for Olympic Torch Delivery, Cairo, Jun 2004•	Mr. Papandreou, Ex. Greek Foreign Minister's Delegation visit to Egypt & Senegal, Feb 2001 and Oct 2001•	Mr. George Koronias, President Vodafone Greece, Jun 2004•	Greek Olympic Games 2004 Trophy to Egypt, Dec 2003•	Mr. Papandreou, Ex Greek Foreign Minister Delegation at The Arab League Summit (Sharm El Sheikh) Mar 2002

summary: “The secret of success is consistency of purpose.”- Benjamin DisraeliI am a strategic and proactive professional with 20 years of experience in establishing & managing operational financial success of business operations from scratch and overseeing the development & implementation of strategies, programs & activities to increase brand awareness & market share. I enjoy challenge of working on complex projects and collaboratively create solutions that have the potential for transformational change within the industry. I am capable of maintaining operational personnel, contracts, approvals and licenses with usual obligation of keeping the organization informed in a timely fashion and working within the authorized budget.Acknowledged as an out-of-the-box thinker, I possess expert knowledge of current and future cost drivers in the industry. Expert in identifying business opportunities for organizational growth, I enhance financial strength and contribution margin as well as create non-operating revenue. I am a passionate problem-solver and positive thinker with core strengths in leading fiscal & operational tasks. I possess excellent interpersonal, communication, and organisational skills with proven capabilities to lead motivated teams towards achieving organizational goals. I have extensively traveled to Western Europe Russia, Greece, Cyprus, South Africa, Ghana, Ethiopia, Morocco, Jordan and Israel. Expertise in speaking French, English, Arabic and Greek Language.Areas of Expertise:•	Strategy Development & Execution •	Business Operations•	Financial Management •	Customer Service Management •	Market Intelligence •	Competitive Analysis •	Relationship Management •	Performance Management •	Team Building & Development •	Problem Solving •	Technical and Managerial Report Writing & Presentation Skills •	Communication Skills  To know more about me, or how can I help you or your business, contact at: waguih.boutros@gmail.com
